data.name: THE JEWISH QUARTER OF ANNE FRANK
data.author: Jenna Collins
data.description: Discover the history of World War II in Amsterdam and follow in the footsteps of Anne Frank on this tour of the Jewish Quarter.

data.name: GAUDI FULL TOUR
data.author: Arianna Watson
data.description: Visit the main works of Gaudi and admire the spectacular views of Barcelona surrounded by modernist architecture.

data.name: THE CROWN JEWELS
data.author: Lisa Thompson
data.description: Absorb over 1,000 years of history at the Tower of London and see the Crown Jewels. Gather fascinating facts about the Yeoman Warders, the guardians of the tower, and discover the ravens.

data.name: HIGHLANDS AND THEIR LEGENDS
data.author: Mark Connely
data.description: Tour the best of the Scottish Highlands. Look for Nessie, meet the hairy cows and see impressive landscapes.

data.name: EDINBURGH TOP TO BOTTOM
data.author: Amber Fletcher
data.description: Visit the city of Edinburgh and the vaults dating back to the early 18th century. Your guide will tell you about murders, witches and the inhabitants of this terrifying place.

data.name: ANCIENT ROME
data.author: Carol Martin
data.description: Enjoy an experience without stress. He admires the remains of some of the most important monuments of the Roman Republic.

data.name: FLAVORS OF ITALY
data.author: Joseph Corner
data.description: Different activities to delight you with the best Italian cuisine.

data.name: THE CITY OF LIGHTS
data.author: Mary Thomas
data.description: Enjoy the City of Light seeing Paris illuminated after dark..

data.name: GOING BACK TO THE MOULIN ROUGE ERA
data.author: Kevin Bourbon
data.description: Enjoy the sumptuous atmosphere of the Moulin Rouge, the world-renowned Parisian cabaret, and its surroundings.
